title: BMW to launch an electric scooter in India that may cost as much as Tata Punch EV
description: BMW Motorrad's CE 04 electric scooter will launch in India on July 24 at Rs 10 lakh, with pre-launch bookings open. It features a 9 kWh battery, 41 bhp, 62 Nm torque, 120 kph top speed, 130 km range, 1 hour 40 minutes fast charge, LED lighting, 10.25-inch digital display, ABS, and dynamic traction control.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
